dmca.title: [ABUSE] RE: FIRST NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT AND DECLARATION: ATLANTIC RECORDS GROUP/T.I.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 21, 2005 4:33 PM
To: copyright@content-type.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] RE: FIRST NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT AND DECLARATION:
ATLANTIC RECORDS GROUP/T.I. [addendum][text]]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] RE: FIRST NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT AND DECLARATION:
ATLANTIC        RECORDS GROUP/T.I. [addendum][text]
Date: Tue, 20 Dec 2005 16:47:57 -0700
From: Copyright Agent (Content-Type.com) <copyright@content-type.com>
To: 'Dorothy Sherman | GrayZone, Inc.' <grayzone@grayzone.com>,
<abuse@theplanet.com>

The reported files T.I.+-+The+KING.rar and The_King.zip have been removed
from the system and their md5 checksums have been banned from the system so
they may not be uploaded in the future.

In addition, upload source IP address 40.0.40.10 and 24.58.148.126 have been
banned to prevent uploading of additional copyrighted content.

If there is anything else we can assist you with, please contact us in
accordance with our terms of service at
http://www.content-type.com/terms_of_service.htm

- -----Original Message-----
From: Dorothy Sherman | GrayZone, Inc. [mailto:grayzone@grayzone.com]
Sent: Tuesday, December 20, 2005 12:59 PM
To: administrator@content-type.com; abuse@theplanet.com;
copyright@content-type.com

GROUP/T.I. [addendum][text]

REGARDING:

http://www.content-type.com/-612716001/T.I.+-+The+KING.rar.htm

ENTITLED:  T.I. - The KING.rar

http://www.content-type.com/1264258489/The_King.zip.htm

ENTITLED:  The_King.zip


IMMEDIATELY CEASE & DESIST FROM PROVIDING ILLEGAL ACCESS TO THIS ADVANCE
ALBUM "T.I. - The KING" IN MP3 FORMAT FROM THE ATLANTIC RECORDS GROUP ARTIST

T.I. AVAILABLE AT THE ABOVE
WEBSITE ADDRESS.

IMMEDIATELY REMOVE ALL UNRELEASED AND UNAUTHORIZED MATERIAL IN CONNECTION
WITH T.I.

IMMEDIATELY REMOVE ALL HOSTED FILES, TORRENT FILES, TRACKERS LINKS AND
REFERENCES IN CONNECTION WITH T.I.'s ADVANCE MATERIAL PLANNED FOR RELEASE BY

ATLANTIC RECORDS GROUP.

THE ABOVE REFERENCED LINKS AND ALL T.I. DOWNLOADS MUST BE COMPLETELY
REMOVED:

I, the undersigned, do solemnly and sincerely declare and CERTIFY UNDER
PENALTY OF PERJURY that:

1. I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of
certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named  ("IP Owner").

2. I have a good faith belief that the items or materials identified in the
addendum attached hereto are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its
agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to
the laws of the:

United States       X
Australia
Canada
EUR
France
Germany
Italy
Japan
Netherlands
United Kingdom
All of the above

Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or
items claimed to be infringing.

3. I may be contacted at:

Printed Name:  Dorothy Sherman
Title:  Consultant
Company:  Atlantic Records Group
Address:  1290 Avenue of the Americas
New York, NY  10104
Attn:  Ariel Taitz, Esq.

Email (correspondence): GrayZone@grayzone.com
Telephone:  212 946-1718
Fax:           718 552-3028


You should understand that this letter constitutes notice to you that the
sale and/or other distribution of this product is unauthorized. This letter
does not constitute a waiver of any right to recover damages incurred by
virtue of any such unauthorized activities, and such rights as well as
claims for other relief are expressly retained.

Finally, notwithstanding our use of www.content-type.com 's required notice
form, we believe that www.content-type.com 's  activities and services fall
outside the scope of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"). Our use
of this form, as required by www.content-type.com , is meant to facilitate
www.content-type.com 's removal of the infringing material listed above and
is not meant to suggest or imply that www.content-type.com 's activities and
services are within the scope of the DMCA.

I make this declaration conscientiously, believing it to be true and
correct, and in accordance with the laws of each of the countries listed
above.  I am aware and agree that the contents of this statement may be
relied upon against me in any court or arbitration proceeding.

Truthfully,

Dorothy Sherman
DIGITAL SIGNATURE:  Not included at request of recipient content-type.com;
will be provided upon request.

Date:  December 20, 2005


================================================
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE:  This e-mail message, and any attachments thereto,
is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain legally
privileged and/or confidential information. Any unauthorized review, use,
disclosure or distribution is strictly prohibited. If you are not the
intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply email and permanently

delete all copies of the original message.
================================================




- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
